name: Drift King
description: Do you want to satisfy your need for speed? Drift King is an unblocked drift game where you have the chance to perform stunning drifts! There are six racetracks with vivid graphics to enjoy. Prepare for going at full speed on these roads.
controls:
WASD or the Arrow Keys: Steer
Spacebar: Handbrake
Left-Shift: Nitro
C: Camera View
R: Reset
I: Start/Stop Engine
L: Lights
M: Rearview Mirror
B/N: Front Hood
P: Fullscreen

name: Drift Hunters Pro
description: Drift Hunters Pro is a game where you can perform drifts with the most impressive cars on the tracks. Now you can enjoy the next-level graphics, gameplay, 10 upgraded cars and 6 tracks. First, you need to check the garage and make some improvements on the car. Changes can be made in the following sections: tuning, paint, wheels and upgrades.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to control car
Space for handbrake
Left shift for nitro
C to change camera
R to reset car
I to start or stop car engine

name: Highway Racer 2
description: Play Highway Racer 2 and get familiar with some upgrades compared to the first version. You can now play the following modes: one-way, two-way, time attack, speed bomb or multiplayer. Join the online servers as a host or create your own room. Wait for other players to enter and you can begin the racing. It is possible to choose the weather conditions: sunny, rainy or night. No matter what you prefer, it is always challenging to see how the car will manifest.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to drive and steer
Left shift to boost car
Space to use handbrake
C to change camera view

name: Football King
description: Football King is an unblocked two-player game in which you can enjoy the thrill of a soccer match with a friend. Choose from quick, friendly matches, tournament options, and a variety of stadiums. Your new favorite soccer game will be Football King!
controls:
Player 1
Move: WASD, Shoot: V, Super shoot: B
Player 2
Move: Arrow Keys, Shoot: K, Super shoot: L

name: Draw the Bridge
description: Draw The Bridge is a fun arcade game where the player has to draw a path for the vehicles.
controls:
On tablet or phone, tap the screen and drag to draw
On PC, click the mouse and drag to draw

name: Hero Rush Tower Defense
description: Hero Rush Tower Defense is a game full of action, strategy and defense power. Dive into a strategic challenge to guard your kingdom and defend it from enemies. You get help from 12 heroes that have different wild abilities. They can protect and destroy everything that puts the lives of the citizens in danger.
controls:
Use mouse to build towers or cast abilities
WASD or arrow keys to see the map and navigate
Mouse scroll wheel to zoom-in and zoom-out.

name: Solitaire Adventure
description: All you must know is that the Solitaire Adventure game is better than the classic version. With 100 levels and 5 chapters, you will play on accessible mode as a beginner and then become a master of cards. Every level has a different arrangement of cards, so you will wish to complete every challenge and gain the combo bonus. Enter the magic world and use your skills and logic to uncover the hidden cards.
controls: Press on Left Mouse to move the cards

name: Kingdom Attack
description: Do you know the feeling when a kingdom disappears in a cloud of dust? It is called victory. Enjoy this game’s intelligence in entertaining after you have upgraded, and make sure you do that. Alchemists, Archers, 120 levels, and action-packed fun. Use these at their maximum value and you will understand what we mean. Get ready to face off against hordes of dragons and other types of creatures in this thrilling adventure. Will your kingdom last?
controls:
Use mouse/touch to play
In the main menu you can swipe or user arrow keys to move the map.

name: Urban Sniper
description: Tired of the classical shooter mechanics but still want to go on a shooting spree? Check out Urban Sniper, the straightforward sniper shooter game with a trick up its sleeve. Stay engaged with each mission we bring since each mission comes with its own small story quest.
controls:
Right click to aim
Left click to shoot
Use mouse to pause to menu and navigate menu

name: Hero Dragon Power
description: Hero Dragon Power game will take you on a thrilling adventure through a magical world full of wild creatures and heroes. You are the game's hero, so you must defeat the evil forces with the dragon powers.
controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space or up arrow to jump or to double jump
Z to punch
X to use ability
C to use ultimate ability
V to recharge

name: Mini Shooters
description: Behind big guns, there are sometimes Mini Shooters. In this game, you pick up your favorite gun and your main goal is to collect coins on your path.
controls:
Press WASD or arrow keys to move
Use the mouse to aim
Use the left mouse click to shoot
Press space bar to pick up the weapon

name: Basketball io
description: Show the world what you’ve got in this fun basketball simulator game. Grab the ball before your competition and run towards the hoop to slam dunk!
controls: WASD or arrow keys to move across the field

name: Stunt Crasher
description: Stunt Crasher is a fun game where you can jump off the ramp and hit the obstacles on your path. More destruction brings more score. Buy new vehicles, upgrade them and get ready for the next stage!
controls: W/S or up/down arrows to control car

name: Super Mini Racing
description: These mini-cars can lift and reenergize you in ways you haven't dreamed about. Run fast for anything keeping you steady; run fast for every unspoken thought. Win every level first and leave the complaints for other days.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to control car
R to respawn car
Tab to pause

name: Blocky Combat Swat
description: Blocky Combat Swat is a 3D shooting game where the player engages with pixelated zombies.
controls:
To move your player, press the WASD or Arrow keys.
To fire, press the left click.
Aim with a right-click.
To reload, press the R key.
To halt, use the Tab key.
You can use the numerical keys or scroll the mouse to change the weapon.

name: Mob City
description: You are a well-dressed guy on a mission to destroy corruption. Run for your life and run to get those bad guys. It's a multiple mission based on a level-up system, so variations on the theme should not be something to worry about. Not only that you can upgrade your weapons, but like a real hero, you have the option to ride cars and transform your experience into a task force.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Space bar to jump
Left mouse click or Z to fire
Right mouse click to throw grenade
Left Shift or C to activate Hammer Time
Mouse Wheel, Q and E for Cycle weapons
Enter, E to enter vehicle
Esc or P to pause game
M to Mute audio toggle
V to change view

name: Crazy Strike Force
description: In Crazy Strike Force, you can prove your shooting skills. Enter the competition against other players and dominate the world.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse click to fire
Right mouse click to aim
Space to jump
Q to slide while running
Left shift to run
1, 2, 3 to change weapon
E or F to interact / pick up weapon
G to throw available dynamite
H to use available medkit
T to chat
L to toggle cursor lock
C to crouch
Hold Tab to show scoreboard
Escape to pause.

name: Idle Dev Startup
description: Idle Dev Startup is an unblocked idle game where the player, being a software developer, tries to develop apps and sell them as a business venture. This company endeavor will involve starting from scratch in every aspect. So, you have to be patient until the business develops. You will be very excited to see your startup slowly grow!
controls: Since this is an idle game, you can write code by just using the mouse click and pressing on the employees.

name: Fort Drifter
description: Welcome to Fort Drifter a perfect game after a busy day. Take time to relax in this casual game that does not ask you to race fight or take on challenges. It was purposefully built full of fun obstacles that help you achieve the most amazing stunts.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to drive
Spacebar for extra speed
E to change cars
Esc to pause to menu
Q to open build menu
WASD keys to choose build shape. The shape shows up in front of your car. Move the car around to choose where to build shape.
Spacebar to build shape

name: Fantasy Tower Defense
description: Fantasy Tower Defense is a fun and challenging game with 36 levels. Limited information encourages the use of imagination, so we don’t want to reveal too much of this game because it can challenge you.
controls:
Use your mouse to click buttons
There is also a tutorial.

name: Snake Wars
description: Snake Wars is an unblocked arcade game where you, as a little snake, try to eat food and get bigger and bigger in a pit.
controls:
To steer the snake, use your mouse cursor.
To boost, use the left mouse button or the Space key.

name: Darkness Survivors
description: Darkness Survivors is an unblocked action game where you choose your beloved hero among four characters and defeat the darkness minions you encounter.
controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys or Mouse: Move
Touchscreen: for Mobile Devices

name: Cobraz io Classic
description: CobraZ.io Classic's abundance of playable game options ensures that it will appeal to a broad audience.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse click to fire
Right mouse click to aim
Space to slide while moving
Left shift to run
1, 2, 3 to change weapon
E or F to interact / pick up weapon
G to throw available dynamite
H to use available medkit
T to chat
L to toggle cursor lock
C to crouch
Hold N to show scoreboard
Esc to pause

name: Crazy Moto Racing
description: Crazy Moto Racing is a 3D motorbike racing game where you will compete against fearless riders through challenging tracks.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to control motorbike
Space to use handbrake
Left Shift to boost

name: Zombie Apocalypse Shooter
description: Zombie Apocalypse Shooter is the game where you become a hero with the mission to save humanity from becoming zombies.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move;
Left shift to run;
Space to jump;
1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 to change weapon;
G to throw grenade;
Left mouse click to fire;
Right mouse click to aim;

name: Soul Essence Adventure
description: Soul Essence Adventure is a big throwback to the 2D classics like Super Mario and Zelda.
controls:
A/D or left/right arrow keys to move
W or up arrow key to jump
S or down arrow key to roll
Spacebar to attack
T to transform if ability is ready
E to interact
Tab or I to open inventory

name: City Police Cars
description: Step on the pedal and drive like crazy because you're the police and you're chasing after the bad guys ahead of you.
controls:
A/D or left/right arrows to control car
W or up arrow to jump

name: Speedrun Parkour
description: Race through exciting levels as quickly as you can in Speedrun Parkour. With tight controls and intuitive movement, you'll be sprinting your way to the finish line in no time.
controls:
Press AD or left/right arrow keys to move.
Press Spacebar, W, or up arrow key to jump.
Press jump/w or up arrow twice for a double jump

name: Galactic Driver
description: Galactic Driver Unblocked is a game not only of speed but of patience. With many obstacles ahead, try to collect the rewards and remain in one piece.
controls:
Left / Right arrows: control the car.
Up arrow or space bar: to jump.

name: Heavy Combat
description: You have a hard mission. You have to eliminate all the evil terrorists, be provided with different guns to use, and have three awesome locations to play in 10 levels for each location. You have different missions to complete, including eliminating terrorists, saving civilians, and defusing bombs. Feel the adrenaline of harsh combat. Can you be a great savior for the citizens?
controls:
WASD: move;
Left mouse button: fire;
Right mouse button: aim;
Space bar: jump;
F: pick weapon/ use item;
Tab: pause;
Number keys: switch weapon;
C: switch between third-person and first-person view;
Ctrl: crouch;
Left Shift: Run;

name: Geometry Dash FreezeNova
description: Leave yourself to the music rhythm! Experience the popular arcade game Geometry Dash unblocked with the FreezeNova difference. Geometry Dash FreezeNova is an extreme arcade game where you need to keep the cube away from all the obstacles in the flowing platform. The most enjoyable way to play this game is to surrender to the rhythm of the music, just like in the classic Geometry Dash. Turn up the volume and try to avoid the obstacles! Are you up for the challenge?
controls: Use the W key, Space key or the upper arrow key to make the cube jump over the obstacles.

name: GTA Simulator
description: GTA Simulator is a game that will let players explore a virtual city. There is complete movement of the character, but tasks and missions will also come along. That means you will engage in various dangerous activities to obtain the achievements.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move;
Swipe to rotate camera (click and drag);
F to enter or leave a vehicle;
E to attack;
Space to jump;
Left shift to run;
Escape or tab to toggle pause menu.

name: Classicube
description: ClassiCube is an unblocked sandbox game inspired by Minecraft Classic. You are free to break blocks or build anything with your unlimited options. How you play this sandbox game is up to your creativity and imagination. You have different types of blocks, such as stone and glassy. You are able to give shape to your virtual land!
controls:
Use the WASD keys to move.
Use the Left-Shift key to run.
Use your Left-Mouse click to break.
Use your Right-Mouse click to place.
Use the Z key to fly.
Use the Q and the E key to make up and down movements while flying.
Use the X key to glitch through solid structures.
Use the Space key to jump.
Use the G key to drop blocks.
Use the B key to open the block menu.
Use the T key to open the chat menu.
Use the R key to spawn.
Use the Enter key to set a spawn point.
Use the number keys 1-9 to switch between blocks.
You may also use your mouse wheel to change blocks.
Use the ESC key to open the menu.

name: Funny Shooter Bro
description: Enemies have never been funnier! Funny Shooter Bro is an unblocked action game where you will deal with many red men throughout 10 levels. When they spot you, they will run to you with sticks in their hands. Dodge their attacks and shoot them at their heads. You must get rid of them to survive in this funny shooting game inspired by Funny Shooter!
controls:
WASD Keys: Move
Mouse: Look Around
Left-Click: Shoot
Right-Click: Aim
R: Reload
G: Throw a Grenade
Shift: Run
Tab: Pause

name: Edys Car Simulator
description: Edy’s Car Simulator is the perfect game for car lovers of all ages! With realistic controls and a variety of cars to choose from, this game is sure to be here for a long time.
controls:
WSAD or arrows to throttle, brake, steer
Space for Handbrake
Enter to reset the vehicle (e.g. if it rolls over)
C to Change the camera
Tab or Page Up / Page Down to select a vehicle
1,2,3,4,5 - to select a specific vehicle
E - Makes the gray stone “jump”. Useful for load tests
R - Repair vehicle damage
T - Slow motion time mode on/off
P - Pause vehicles. Camera and vehicle selection can be used while paused.
Y - Show/Hide telemetry
Shift + Y - Change Telemetry mode.
Shift + Esc or Shift + R - Reset scene

name: Police Traffic
description: Whatever your urgency is as a police officer, be careful with the traffic. The highway is pretty crowded. Police cars come in many ways, but safety and time are primordial. Police Traffic is a game with three options of very well made graphics and other three in choosing a stage. Many other options are waiting for you to pick up. Are you ready to take on a mission? Collect money according to your speed rate and space traveled. And you will discover how this game grows on you.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to drive
Left Shift for NOS
Space for handbrake
Tab or Esc to toggle pause

name: Crazy Drifter
description: Do you miss driving a car and drifting on challenging tracks? Crazy Drifter gives the opportunity to keep you engaged by playing many modes.
controls:
You can play Crazy Drifter by using your keyboard.
Press WASD or arrow keys to race with your car.
Hold Spacebar to use hand brake.
Hold Left Shift to use boost.
Choose your route by clicking on the map.

name: Xmas Cookie Clicker
description: Xmas Cookie Clicker is an unblocked idle clicker game where you try to get coins by tapping on the Cookie Xmas. The more you click on this sweet Cookie, the more coins you get. Use boosters and increase the coins you earn with each click and second. As you progress through the game, you will unlock different cookie characters!
controls: Tap on the Cookie Xmas to earn cookie coins.

name: Neon Moto Driver
description: A neon blue azure highway overlapped on a purple sunset with a mountain view. This is what Neon Moto Driver has to offer. And when it comes to your car’s abilities, well, there are a few. It can flip and flop, of course in a limited number of ways, collect diamonds while you make sure you stay on track. How many times can it revive? That’s for you to discover. It’s a game of patience, it’s challenging and it’s fun. What are you waiting for? Be the first to unlock all the levels.
controls:
Left / Right arrows: control
Up arrow or space bar: to jump

name: Neon Slither Sim
description: The situation gets busy in space where you fly with your bike and collect small bullets of light. They sparkle and I’m sure you want to collect them all but be patient and pay good attention to the other vehicles or some snakes roaming around. Others have collided and now you can absorb the stars they’ve left behind. All in a row. We heard Neon Slither Sim is addictive, but we say it’s just another game that completes your coordination skills and perfections your attention. Isn't it great to be able to take a break from reality, from time to time?
controls: You can play only by using your mouse. The bike will automatically move towards your cursor and you can boost the speed of your bike by pressing the left click.

name: Dino Evolution io
description: Dino Evolution io is a simple but charming graphics game that will raise your adrenaline. Want to get invigorated? Try to feed the little dinosaur, and I say try because you are being surrounded by other hungry ones. We’ve prepared a danger zone that you can’t avoid, so things are getting tougher and exciting at the same time.
controls: Arrow keys or mouse to play

name: FPS Simulator
description: FPS Simulator is an unblocked first-person shooter game where you, as a soldier, engage in intense battles in expansive military arenas. You can fight alongside your team, or every soldier can fight alone in the deathmatch. Game maps are broad, and there are many places to hide and seek.
controls:
To fire, use the Left Mouse button.
To aim, use the Right Mouse button.
Use the WASD or the Arrow keys to move.
Press the R key to reload.
Press the Space key to jump.
Use the 1-9 number keys to change weapons.
To pause, press the ESC or the Tab key.

name: Dark Ninja Hanjo
description: Dark Ninja Hanjo is an adventure game that gives you the challenge to explore the destroyed city and face off the enemies that are trying to break you down. It's up to you to search for clues, complete tasks and battle the enemy groups. Recover the ancient Scroll and use it for victory. Customize your character, create the strategy and use the speed and reflexes to defeat the dangerous evil. Read the story details and follow the instructions to progress through each level.
controls:
W,S,A,D to move
Space to jump
C to Change Camera
Right Mouse to Projectile
E to change Weapon
T to change Power
Left Mouse to use Basic Attack
X to Special Move
R to Change Projectile
TAB to Pause Game

name: Arena of Heroes
description: The epic Arena of Heroes is finally here! Build your village, train the mightiest warriors and invade online villages in search of Gold and Elixir.
controls: Tap or click on the working items

name: Crazy Battle Royale
description: Crazy Battle Royale is the perfect game for any shooting fan looking for a challenge. With challenging gameplay and fierce competition, only the strongest will be crowned the ultimate battle royale champion!
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse click to shoot
Right mouse click to aim
E to show weapons menu
1,2,3 to change weapon
G to throw a grenade
Space to jump
Escape or tab to pause

name: Car Football
description: Car Football is a game where players control the sports cars while trying to score goals on the opponent's side.
controls: WASD or arrow keys to control car

name: Police Chase Drifter
description: Police Chase Drifter is a fun car game where you get to run from the police!
controls: WASD or arrow keys to control car

name: Masked Special Forces
description: Masked Special Forces is here to satisfy your need for high quality shooter action.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse click to fire
Right mouse click to aim
Space to jump
Q to slide while running
Left shift to run
1, 2, 3 to change weapon
E or F to interact or pick up weapon
G to throw available dynamite
H to use available medkit
T to chat
L to toggle cursor lock
C to crouch
Hold Tab to show scoreboard
Escape to pause

name: Highway Traffic
description: The key to this game is patience — it’s not about racing; it’s about slowly and carefully meandering through the traffic.
controls:
W or up arrow to accelerate
A D, or left right arrow to steer the car
Space bar to use handbrake
Left shift or F to use car boost

name: 1v1 LOL
description: Eliminate all other opponents and become the last survivor!
2048 is an easy and fun puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile.

name: 8Ball Pool
description: Play 8-ball pool against and friend or the computer. Don't hit the 8ball in!
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: Among Us
description: Play as the imposter aboard a space ship. Kill all other players to win.

name: Angry Sharks
description:
In Angry Sharks, it's time to see what's going on under the ocean's surface. There is a whole different world under the sea after all. However, no matter how deep the ocean goes, it is not beyond humans' grasp. Are you ready to take control of a shark that is not quite what it seems?

Become the king of the ocean in this action-packed shark simulation game! Swim into fish to take a bite out of them. Eat fish to grow, but watch out for pufferfish which will hurt you badly! Also, be mindful to avoid nuclear waste barrels floating through the ocean. Grow to be the biggest shark you can be!

name: Appel Platformer
description: Simple and fun platformer game. Try to beat levels in record breaking times!

name: Aquapark.io
description: Aquapark.io is the ultimate water slide adventure game that takes you on a thrilling ride through multiple levels of challenging obstacles and water slides. With realistic physics and addictive gameplay, this game is perfect for anyone looking for a fun and exciting way to spend their free time. Race against your friends or other players from around the world to see who can reach the end of the slide first. Play now and experience the ultimate water slide adventure!

name: Awesome Tanks 2
description:
Awesome Tanks 2 is an engaging fighting game. Your task is to defeat enemy tanks, collect coins, and destroy the enemy base in order to clear each level. Collect coins along the way and use them to upgrade your tank with better armor, weapons, visibility and more.
You destroy rival tanks using cannons, flamethrowers, lasers, missiles and more with weapon upgrades. Don't forget to upgrade weapons to improve your fighting power. Need a performance upgrade, especially armor, which will help protect your tank against heavy fire. Movement speed is also useful for dodging, especially against oncoming missiles.
In each level, you'll be surrounded by darkness. You'll need to move and discover the place. The problem is, enemy tanks are lurking around every corner, so you better be on your guard. To be able to play in the next level you need to destroy all enemies. You can destroy the boxes you can see around to get more coins. The boxes are always essential, collect them all to get more power. But sometimes it's a trap, like a bomb, get away from it quickly.
As you progress, it gets harder and harder to earn rewards. You can choose the difficulty of the game. Your achievements will be recognized, so play as hard as you can.

name: Bad Ice Cream
description: Bad Ice-Cream is a fun 2-player puzzle game where you play as an Ice Cream. Choose a flavor, and add fruit to your ice cream! This sub-zero Pacman mod features cool graphics and tasty desserts. Travel through each maze-like level, and collect fruit for points. Clear all fruit without getting caught, and enjoy your tasty treat! Use your ice-breaking powers to smash blocks of ice or create your own icy barriers for protection. Go ahead, eat all the fruits!
controls:
Move - [WASD] or [Arrow keys]
Freeze or Break Ice - [F] or [Space]

name: Bad Ice Cream 2
description: Bad Ice-Cream 2 is a 2-player puzzle game developed by Nitrome. Choose a flavor, and add fruit to your ice cream! Go to war with soft-serve ice cream and hungry foes on icy battlefields! In Bad Ice-Cream 2, you will play as a rogue dessert that refuses to be eaten. Choose your favorite frozen flavor, and find the fruit in ice block mazes! Clear all fruit without getting caught, and enjoy your tasty treat! Use your ice-breaking powers to smash blocks of ice or create your own icy barriers for protection. Go ahead, eat all the fruits!
controls:
Move - [WASD] or [Arrow keys]
Freeze or Break Ice - [Q] or [Space]

name: Bad Ice Cream 3
description:
Bad Ice-Cream is a fun 2-player puzzle game where you play as an Ice Cream. Choose a flavor, and add fruit to your ice cream! This sub-zero Pacman mod features cool graphics and tasty desserts. Travel through each maze-like level, and collect fruit for points. Clear all fruit without getting caught, and enjoy your tasty treat! Use your ice-breaking powers to smash blocks of ice or create your own icy barriers for protection. Go ahead, eat all the fruits!

Bad Ice-Cream is developed by Nitrome. They released the game in December 2010. There are 40 levels to beat. Every level has different themes and challenges. The game has remained to be popular to this day! Enjoy your frosty adventures alone or together with a friend here on Totally Science!
controls:
Move - [WASD] or [Arrow keys]
Freeze or Break Ice - [Space]

name: Baldis Basics
description:
The first Baldi Basics online session doesn’t seem spooky at all. A goofy-looking elementary school teacher welcomes the protagonist to class. The surroundings are bright and well lit, the music is cheerful. Nothing appears threatening or alarming at first. However, something vile and unnerving is happening behind the scenes. Only the bravest souls will be able to handle what lies ahead.

Baldi’s Basics is not like most other online games on our Totally Science website. It is a weird combination of an educational learning game and a horror story. The gameplay might seem a bit boring at first, but there is a scary plot that will shock you! School is out and you have returned to collect some notebooks for a friend. You will meet a creepy teacher called Baldi, who likes to give simple challenges to his students and doesn’t like wrong answers. Enter each classroom, open notebooks and solve fun trivia problems to make Baldi happy. If your answer is correct, Baldi will give you a coin as a reward for your knowledge. If your answer is wrong though, strange things will happen and you should better start running for your life. Because, this teacher has some serious mental issues and making him angry is not a good idea! To complete the Baldi’s Basics game at Totally Science, you will need to collect all 7 notebooks and get to the exit in one piece.
controls:
Move - [WASD] or [Arrow keys]
Run - [Shift]
Pick up items - [Left-click]
Use items - [Right-click]

name: Ball Blast
description: Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive?

name: Basket Bros
description:
BasketBros is a side-scrolling basketball game in which you compete against formidable opponents. In this frantic basketball game, you'll soar through the air and slam all over the place to win!

BasketBros game was created by Blue Wizard Digital. This is a fast-paced basketball game for two players that you can play with a friend over the weekend to relax and have fun. You can choose your favorite character from the table before starting the game; although you will have to unlock the majority of the characters in the game, you will receive four free character slots in order to participate in the battle.

name: Basket Random
description: Try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other! Changing fields, changing players and changing balls do not surprise you! The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game.

name: Basketball Stars
description: You can play solo or with a friend as a variety of legendary basketball players.

name: Bit Life
description:
How will you live your BitLife?

Will you try to make all the right choices in an attempt to become a model citizen sometime before you die? You could marry the love of your life, have kids, and pick up a good education along the way.

Or will you play choices that horrify your parents? You could descend into a life of crime, fall in love or go on adventures, start prison...

name: Bloons TD 4
description: A classic tower defense game initially released in Flash. Defend the path by placing various defenses tactically around the map.

name: Bob the Robber 2
description:
Bob the Robber is a fun adventure game where you play as a thief named Bob to steal everything. Avoid Patrolling guards, laser sensors, and security cameras.

Reach the goal in each level and escape safely! Disarm cameras, hide from guards, disable traps and much more!
controls:
Move - [Arrow Keys]
Look inside objects for money - [Up Arrow]

name: Boxing Random
description: Changing conditions occur in every round. Sometimes the boxing field changes and sometimes the boxers. Adapt to every random feature and hit accurately. The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game!

name: Breaking The Bank
description: Attempt to break into a bank, built in the middle of a desert.

name: Bubble Popper
description: Pop the bubbles by matching the correct colors. Try to beat all the levels!

name: Burger and Frights
description: Burger & Frights is a short horror game in which the player rides a bike throughout a dark forest. The game was inspired by games such as Rides with Strangers, and a certain horror movie by John Carpenter.

name: Candy Crush
description: Match and decimate clusters of hard candies and tasty fruits in our expansive assortment of Candy Crush games! You can play a classic game of Bejeweled, but with sugary sweets in the place of gemstones. Shift the treats around the board to make matches based on color and shape.

name: Cannon Basketball 4
description: Cannon Basketball is a puzzle game that combines the amazing sport of basketball together with Angry-Birds-style gameplay. You control a cannon and during each level, you must fire basketballs from the cannon into the basket. The only issue is however is that the basket is blocked by a series of different obstacles such as wooden blanks and walls - you must keep firing balls to bust through any obstacle to reach the hoop.

name: Car Parking Chaos
description: Park the car in the yellow parking spot as quick as possible!
controls:
[Arrow Keys] - move
To park, drive inside a yellow parking spot
(Must be very exact)

name: Cat Miner 2
description: A side-view Minecraft-inspired game with a Scratch cat character! Mine, mine, mine!

name: Cat Trap
description: Try to out smart the cat! Don't let him escape.

name: Chess
description: Online board game where your could play against a friend or the computer.
controls: Use your mouse to drag the piece you want to move

name: Chess.com
description: Online board game where your could play against a friend or the computer.
controls: Use your mouse to drag the piece you want to move

name: Clash of Vikings
description: Command your Vikings and destroy the enemy's base in Clash of Vikings. The base is guarded by two towers.

name: Cluster Rush
description: Cluster Rush is a first-person run-and-jump game inspired by Clustertruck, a well-known Steam title. Jump from truck to truck and reach the gates to finish each level.

name: College 2048
description: The college edition of the classic 2048 game. Try to get to the MIT tile.

name: Connect 4
description: Get 4 pieces in a row to win. Play against a friend or the computer.
controls: Click where your want to place your piece

name: Cookie Clicker
description: Click, click, click. Upgrade your bakery as you get more cookies in this idle game.

name: Crossy Road
description: 8-bit endless arcade hopper that started it all. Collect custom characters and navigate freeways, railroads, rivers and much more.
controls:
[Space] - move forward
[Arrow Keys] - move left and right

name: Crossy Road Space
description: The space version of Crossy Road, the 8-bit endless arcade hopper that started it all. Collect custom characters and navigate freeways, railroads, rivers and much more.
controls:
[Space] - move forward
[Arrow Keys] - move left and right

name: CSGO Surf
description: A popular game mode in CSGO. You'll be gliding along slopes and flying off of surfaces.
controls:
[WASD] - move
[1] - use primary weapon
[2] - use secondary weapon
[3] - use Knife
[r] to reload a weapon
[f] - inspect a weapon
[Click] - shoot/attack

name: Cube Dodge
description: An endless obstacle running game. This game trains visual perception, and reaction time.

name: Cupcake2048
description: The cupcake edition of the classic 2048 game. Mix cupcakes together to create new ones!

name: Cut The Rope
description: Cut the rope to feed candy to the green monster! Om Nom is hungry for large pieces of candy. Your mission is to feed him as quickly as possible. You can collect stars in each level for bonus points. Slice every rope at the right time to win!

name: Deal or No Deal
description: Deal or no Deal. Try your luck in finding the $1,000,000 briefcase in this game based on the hit TV game show!

name: Death Run 3D
description:
Death Run 3D is a thrilling first-person running game in which you will have to run in a neon tunnel and avoid all obstacles to try to get the highest score.

Control and avoid all obstacles in the tunnel to gain the best score in first-person view! You will run automatically inside a tube with many various blocks which almost can move. They will cause you various challenges and difficulties due to their unpredictable change and your max speed. You think the game is easy. However, it is not easy to master. The race is endless until you hit a block in the tube.

Try to get the highest score in this infinite game. You can check your rank on the worldwide leaderboard. Raise your name on the top of the leaderboard to show your skills! You can try getting over yourself and with other players around the world.

name: Doge Miner
description: Your mission is to get to the moon! To get there cost 50,000,000,000 dogecoin. Goodluck!

name: Dreadhead Parkour
description: Dreadhead Parkour is a parkour game where you play as the flashy Dreadhead and get to slide, backflip, frontflip and move around each level to reach the end! Collect all the coins to get new skins and max your score on each level! There are plenty of bombs, spikes, huge jumps and tons more to hop over or slide under to keep your eyes open and your head up so as not to get hit! How hardcore is your parkour...?

name: Drift Boss
description: Simple but addictive car drifting game. Collect coins and upgrade your car.

name: Drift Hunters
description: An awesome 3D car driving game in which you score points by drifting various cars.
controls:
[WASD] - drive
[Space] - handbrake
[c] - change camera
[LShift] - shift up gear
[LCtrl] - shift down gear

name: Drunken Boxing
description: In the fun game called "Drunken Boxing," the Drunken Boxers are having battles in an arena. They are trying to make each other fall down. You can punch fast in the game, but be careful of your Energy Bar. If your energy runs out, you'll need to rest for a bit. That means you can get hurt easily, so make sure to think about your energy when you fight!

name: Ducklife
description: The future of the farm is in your hands! Train your duck then compete in challenges to save the farm.

name: Ducklife 2
description: Increase your skills via the mini games and win all the races to become the  world champion.

name: Ducklife 3
description: Collect coins and purchase upgrades to help your duck become world champion.

name: Ducklife 4
description: Raise a duck to become a professional racer! You can choose an egg to hatch, and customize its appearance.

name: Dune!
description: Jump above the line to score, but beware! The higher you get, the harder the landing will be! Don't crash and keep it smooth!

name: Eaglercraft Minecraft
description: Minecraft eaglercraft 1.8.8 in your browser
controls: WASD to move, space to jump

name: Economical
description: 2D puzzle action game where saving coins is important! Aiming for a goal using items. Make a way with blocks.

name: Elastic Man
description: Satisfying game where you can squish, pull, and distort Morty's head.
controls: Drag features with mouse or touch-screen

name: Escaping The Prison
description: Stick figure game where you... Well, escape the prison! You must use everything at your disposal to escape!

name: Factory Balls
description: You've been hired by the ball factory to create amazing designs. Can you succeed?

name: Fall Boys
description: A multiplayer battle royale obstacle course. Be the last one standing!

name: Fall Guys
description: A multiplayer battle royale obstacle course. Be the last one standing!

name: Fireboy and Watergirl
description: Help Fireboy and Watergirl work together to get through each maze to the exit.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Dodge the tubes and try to beat the high score!

name: Fleeing The Complex
description: You are trapped inside a small prison cell, and you have to escape not just your cell, but the whole prison!

name: Flip 3d
description: An addictive puzzle game that tests your logic and patience. The aim of the game is simple – you must direct the block into the hole.

name: FNAF 1
description: The classic Five Nights at Freddy's game. Don't get too scared!

name: FNAF 2
description: A horror game in which you work as a newly hired security guard for the night shift.
controls: Use the mouse to interact with objects

name: FNAF 3
description: 30 years after the events that took place in 5 Nights at Freddy's.

name: FNAF 4
description: The final chapter of FNAF radically changes its location and gameplay while upping the level of thrill even further.
controls:
Use mouse to interact
[Space] - flashlight
Flick mouse down to look behind you
[Click] - close/open door
[x] - hide tips

name: FNAF Sister Location
description: A point-and-click survival horror video game created to fit in the FNAF series.
controls:
[Click] - interact
[w] - move in vent
MUST TURN VOLUME ON TO HEAR TASKS

name: FNAF World
description: An Indie RPG and a spin-off of the Five Nights at Freddy's series.

name: Fortnite 2d
description: A massive multiplayer Battle Royale game in your browser. Players are represented by circular figures on a 2D grid-like playing field, surrounded by a circular blue zone that shrinks as the game advances.
controls:
[WASD] or [Arrows Keys] - move
[Mouse] - look around
[e] - interact
[q] - drop
[f] - build
[z] - emotes
[b] - get unstuck from wall
[l] - leave modes

name: Friday Night Funkin
description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

name: Friday Night Funkin VS Shaggy 2.5 Mod
description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

name: Friday Night Funkin VS Sonic Mod
description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

name: Friday Night Funkin VS Stickman Mod
description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

name: Friday Night Funkin VS Tricky HD Mod
description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

name: Galactic Wars
description: Fight in the space war between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.
controls:
Arrow keys to move
Click 'n' to fire

name: Geometry Dash
description: Dodge spikes and don't die!

name: Geometry Dash Remastered
description: Welcome all to Geometry Dash Remastered, and, well, you already know the game. But this is more, this is 5 new levels you can't find anywhere else, this... is REMASTERED(I 'm totally serious).

name: Getaway Shootout
description: Race three others to the extraction point. This is no ordinary race as you can only jump your way to the finish line.
controls:
PLAYER ONE
[w] - jump left
[r] - jump right
[r] - power-up

PLAYER TWO
[i] - jump left
[o] - jump right
[p] - power-up

name: Getting Over It
description: Push, Drag and Throw yourself up the level in your quest to Get Over It.

name: Granny
description: GRANNY is a survival horror game revolving around stealth gameplay. You're being held captive by an insane, blind old woman who hears everything, and also shambles around a small two-level house carrying a bat and dropping leg-mangling bear traps.

name: Gun Mayhem 2
description: More explosive arena style action! Battle against the AI or with friends in this cartoony platform shooter.

name: GunSpin
description: Gunspin is a physics game where you shoot a gun to keep it flying for as long as possible. Upgrade your gun with more bullets and power to make it travel even further.

name: Happy Filled Glass 3
description: The happy glass is back once more! Pour water into the glass. Create limits and paths. Try out your concepts, then tweak them and try again. 30 difficult levels to complete!

name: Happy Room
description: Here tests are taken upon highly durable robots using the newest weapon technologies.

name: Happy Wheels
description: Side-scrolling, physics-based, obstacle course game. Try to get to the end without dying!

name: HexGL
description: A futuristic, fast-paced racing game where you control a hovercraft.
controls:
[Arrow Keys] - turn
[Up Arrow] - accelerate
[a] - left brake
[d] - right brake

name: House of Hazards
description: House of Hazards is a super fun game where you get to explore a house full of crazy challenges! You can play with your friends and try to complete funny tasks like dodging slippery banana peels, avoiding crazy robots, and jumping over giant donuts. It's a race to see who can finish the challenges first and become the ultimate champion! Get ready for lots of laughs and silly surprises in the House of Hazards!
controls:
PLAYER 1:
Jump: W
Move left and right: A, D
Crouch and Fire: S

PLAYER 2:
Jump: I
Move left and right: J, L
Crouch and Fire: K

name: Hypersnake
description: Hypersnake is a skill game where you have to collect balls to grow your snake and find the path of least resistance to make it as far as possible. How far can you go in Hypersnake?

name: Immaculate Grid
description: Immaculate Grid is a browser game in which players get nine guesses to fill a 3x3 grid with professional athletes.
controls: Select a player for each of the nine cells that matches that criteria for that cell's row and column

name: Infiltrating The Airship
description: Try not to fail during a deadly mission in the sky! Infiltrating the Airship dares you to make risky decisions.

name: Interative Buddy
description:
Interactive Buddy is an arcade game where you interact with your virtual buddy. For every interaction, you earn money to buy new weapons, skins, and more!

Hit the buddy with hammers and blades, shoot him with pistols and rifles, let him explode with grenades and even drop flames on him! Let off some steam and get rid of any anger!

name: Jacksmith
description: Jacksmith is the craftiest donkey in all the land. In Jacksmith, you are a blacksmith crafting a wide range of weapons for all of your warriors. Crafting weapons is completely hands-on. Choose your ore, choose your mold, melt it, pour it, construct it, and design it. Whether it's swords, bows, arrows, axes, or others things, you'll need skills and strategy to make the perfect weapon. After crafting, it's off to battle with your team of warriors. As they fight, you gather loot and man the cannons, and keep making progress towards the Great Wizard Dudley!

name: Jetpack Joyride
description: In Jetpack Joyride you dodge fire and missiles, while collecting coins through all the havoc.

name: Just Fall
description:
Just Fall LOL is not just a penguin game; it's also an online multiplayer game with friends. Players play as penguins and compete in hexagonal arenas to see who can be the champion of the race.

This game has simple rules. You need to use arrow keys to play with the cute penguin, move, jump and slide. Besides, you can choose 1 of 12 different colors to decorate your character's skin and various game modes.

In each game, you will randomly match with another player or invite friends to form a group of 8 people. Your task is to control the penguin and hold out on the ice for as long as possible. Icebergs will fall after people walk on them. It would be best if you stayed away from the holes. Be the last person to fall into the sea to put your name on the leaderboard.

name: Kirby The Amazing Mirror
description: The Kingdom of Mirrors has been invaded and Kirby's going to need to call for backup.
controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - jump
[x] - suck/release air

name: Learn To Fly
description: Launch the penguin as far as you can. At first, it will be very hard, but you can slowly fly a longer distance, make more money, and buy all the upgrades.

name: Madalin Cars Multiplayer
description: Online car driving game in the hugely popular `Mada`lin Cars series. Choose from a range of different sports cars and customize them to your liking. You can change the color and drive settings of your car to give yourself a truly personalized ride!
controls:
WASD or arrow keys - move
[f] to use nitro
[c] to change camera
[r] to reset car
[i] to start or stop engine
[Space] - use handbrake

name: Madalin Stunt Cars 2
description: 3D stunt driving game featuring some of the world’s most powerful cars. Jump behind the wheel of your favorite automobile and race around one of the three expansive maps. You can invite your friends to play in any of the online multiplayer servers to share the high-octane thrill.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys - move
[Shift] to use nitro
[r] to reset car

name: Mini Golf Online
description: Challenge other players to play golf! Get your golf ball into the hole before your opponent does!
controls: Click and drag to aim and shoot

name: Minigolf
description: Line up your putt for a hole-in-one! Watch our for hills and water traps.
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: Monkey Mart
description: Monkey Mart is an idle/management game where you control a cute monkey character who is in charge of a supermarket. Plant fruits, harvest produce, move around from station to station to fill the stands with various food items. Sell bananas, corn, eggs, peanuts, coffee beans, chocolate, wheat etc.

name: Moto X3M
description: Hop on your dirt bike and ride over jumps, do tricks, and try not to fly off in Moto X3M. Memorize the course and execute your stunts perfectly.

name: Moto X3M Pool Party
description: A motorbike racing game with summer as the main theme. This 5th part in the Moto X3M series has 22 new challenging levels. Race your motorbike through pools and beaches and discover all the new obstacles in this sequel in the Moto X3M series.

name: Moto X3M Spooky Land
description: Moto X3M Spooky Land is a stunt motor bike game and is the sixth release in the Moto X3M series. This time with a complete halloween theme where you drive your motor through spooky halloween levels and you have to perform all kinds of stunts to dodge objects of hazards coming your way.

name: Moto X3M Winter
description: Speed with your motorbike across icy mountains in Moto X3M 4: Winter! This motorbike game dares you to drive on bridges made of candy canes and other sweet treats. Ride a motorcycle past snowmen and Christmas trees with Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and Santa Claus!

name: Orcs VS Elves
description: Blast away the orcs and elves! Knock them out to get more balls and power up your damage multiplier.
controls:
Use mouse to aim
Click to shoot

name: Papas Pizzeria
description: Ever wanted to have your own pizza restraunt? Here you go!
controls:
Use your mouse to click buttons, not make keyboard controls.
There is also a tutorial.

name: Paper Minecraft
description: The amazing world of minecraft but 2D!
controls:
[WASD] - Move / Jump
[E] - Open/Close Inventory
[Click] - Place or Mine
[1 to 9] - Select Item
[E+hover] - Open / Close Chest, Crafting Table, Door
[Space] - Drop single tile from a stack while dragging.
[F] - Eat food
[N] - Label a sign or chest
[Q] - Drop item
[P] - Pause / Unpause
[T] - Talk / Command
[O] - Save your game
[Shift] - Sprint
[M] - Music / Sounds

name: Paper.io
description: Invade as many lands as possible and become the biggest on the server!

name: Parking Fury 3D
description: Avoid cops, steal cars, and drive around in this beautiful beach scenery.

name: Penalty Challenge
description: Penalty Challenge Multiplayer is a fun game in which you get to test out your soccer skills! There are two games modes – in both, you take in turns to shoot or become the goalkeeper.

name: Ping Pong
description: See how many times you can bounce the ball in the air without dropping it!
controls:
Drag mouse to move paddle
[Click] - drop ball

name: Pixel Gun 3D
description: Pixel Gun 3D game with blocky multiplayer action. Have fun in this blocky-style multiplayer 3D first-person shooter game. Jump into the blocky world of one of the best free online games around. In this awesome multiplayer game, choose a blocky character and try to rack up as many kills as possible.

name: Pokemon Fire Red
description: Start your journey in Pallet Town where you choose your Pokemon. Take down Team Rocket!
controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Shift] - select
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - a
[x] - b

name: Pokemon Leaf Green
description: Your mission is to collect all 150 Pokémon. Go catch em all!
controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Shift] - select
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - a
[x] - b

name: Poor Bunny
description: Poor Bunny is a skill game where you control a cute bunny character and eat all the delicious carrots in a dangerous obstacle course. Hop on and off platforms and while avoiding rapidly increasing deadly traps that appear out of nowhere. Don't miss the golden carrot when it spawns as it's worth 5 normal carrots.
controls: Move Player 1 - [WASD] or Move Player 2 [Arrow Keys]

name: Rabbit Samurai
description: Rabbit Samurai is a skill game created by Mini Duck Games. Swing, collect carrots and save your friends! Your goal is to find and rescue little mice from the mousetrap at the wolf's lair in the green land. Embark on an epic adventure where you can showcase your ninja skills with the help of your grappling hook and agile movements. Launch yourself from the rocket ninja cannon, collect carrots and crystals, avoid dangerous spikes and save all your mice friends!

name: Rabbit Samurai 2
description: Rabbit Samurai 2 is a skill game created by Mini Duck Games. Swing, collect carrots and save your friends! Your goal is to find and rescue little mice from the mousetrap at the wolf's lair in the green land. Embark on an epic adventure where you can showcase your ninja skills with the help of your grappling hook and agile movements. Launch yourself from the rocket ninja cannon, collect carrots and crystals, avoid dangerous spikes and save all your mice friends!

name: Raft Wars
description: A fun, level-based shooting game, where you and your brother Simon will need to defend your treasure from enemies of all kinds!

name: Retro Bowl
description: This is a 2D retro-style football game where your goal is to win the Retro Bowl!
controls:
CTRL+W to move forward.
Also, you can drag the mouse to throw the ball.
There is a tutorial to help you play!

name: Riddle School
description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

name: Riddle School 2
description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

name: Riddle School 3
description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

name: Riddle School 4
description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

name: Riddle School 5
description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

name: Rocket League
description: A fun car soccer 3D game that can be played 1 and 2 player.

name: Rolling Sky
description: A fun musical skill game. You are a ball rolling over a track with tons of hazards to make you fall.

name: Rolling Vortex
description: Dodge the rings and collect coins. Try to beat the highscore!

name: Rooftop Snipers
description: A pixel-style shooting game. Shoot famous characters off the roof.

name: Run 3
description: Try to stay on the track for as long as you can. You can choose from two different modes when playing. In infinite mode, you run for as long as you can. It's your job to try and keep your character from drifting into the vastness of outer space.

name: Sans Fight
description: Sans is the final boss of the Genocide Route in Undertale.

name: Slime Rush TD
description: In Slime Rush TD 2, the slime monsters are on their way to destroy your kingdom again! To protect the kingdom, you'll need to use your defensive skills. Fortunately, these new defense towers are more powerful than ever! To protect the whole kingdom, all you need to do is upgrading your defense towers, preventing the invasion by destroying the enemy slimes before they reach the castle! If you are ready, let's start the game!

name: Slope
description: An endless space run game where you need to avoid red obstacles at all costs.

name: Slope 2
description: The sequel to the Slope game. The gameplay has changed slightly, but the mechanics remain the same. Let me remind you that as the difficulty of each level increases, the ball moves extremely quickly.

name: Smash Karts
description: Smash Karts is a 3D driving game where the objective is to collect surprise boxes and survive using whatever you find in them: Bullets, grenades, even rockets?! Buckle up, wear your helmet, reload your guns and eliminate your opponents!

name: Snake
description: Eat as many apples as you can without overlapping you body or hitting a wall.

name: Sniper
description: Find your target and eliminate them as quickly as possible.

name: Soccer Free Kicks
description: Train your freekick shooting skills through 15 levels of increasing difficulty!
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: Soccer Random
description: Try to score a goal by using only one key with different variations from each other! Sometimes you will play on a iced field or you will play on a beach. The goal of the game is, to score five goals.

name: Solitaire
description: Fun and easy to pick up on card game.
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: Squid Game
description: Complete the following challenges inspired by the popular show Squid Games.
controls: Click and drag based on the directions given

name: Stack
description: Stack the blocks as high as you can. Try to beat the highscore!

name: Stack Bump 3D
description: Shoot the tower to make it disappear until the last block while avoiding the black area.

name: Stealing The Diamond
description: Help Henry Stickmin break into a museum and execute a diamond heist.

name: Storm the House 2
description: A free tower defense game. Those pesky stickfigures are at it again! Defend your castle!

name: Street Fighter
description: A classic fighting game. You will engage in one-on-one close quarter combat against your opponent.

name: Stunt Cars 2
description: Drift, drive off ramps, and do a flip!

name: Subway Surfers
description: A classic endless runner game. You play as Jake, who surfs the subways and tries to escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog.

name: Super Football Fever
description: Jump into the fun with Super Football Fever! It's a cool game where you can play soccer online. The World Cup is around the corner, and you get to pick your favorite team! Score three goals before time runs out to win. Play like a real soccer hero by defending well and helping your teammates. You can play alone or with your family and friends. It's a super awesome game for everyone who loves soccer! Give it a try and have a blast!

name: Super Mario Bros 3
description: A platoformer action-adventure game of the classic Mario franchise.
controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - select/jump
[x] - back/attack

name: Superhot
description: A first-person shooter game where time moves once you move. Shoot and move around to see your bullets fly off. Stand still and your bullets will stop moving too. This counts for enemy fire as well! Move around and shoot your enemies. Stand still and look for the best ways to move and dodge incoming fire.

name: Tactical Assasin 2
description: Tactical Assassin 2 is a fantastic sniper shooting game with straight forward missions and outstanding weapons. You are a formidable sniper and your mission is to eliminate certain individuals. You will get a list of objectives at the beginning of every mission. Aim and shoot with your mouse to earn money and buy new equipment in the store to complete your goals. Always keep in mind to have enough ammunition for your next task.

name: Tanuki Sunset
description: Play as a racoon on a skateboard. Drift at turns and collect coins. Try to beat the highscore!

name: Temple Run
description: An infinite runner where the player must escape from his enemy and avoid all the obstacles and traps that are found along the way. Traverse cliffs, forests and even mines, and help this fearless treasure hunter escape with the gold idol. But hurry up! The evil monkey monsters are chasing you!
controls:
[AD] or [Left/Right arrows] - move
[w] or [Up arrow] - jump
[s] or [Down arrow] - slide down

name: Tennis Physics
description: Tennis Physics is a super cool game where you play tennis with a twist! Instead of using a regular tennis ball, you get to hit a bouncy, crazy ball that moves in all sorts of wacky ways. The tennis court is like a magical playground where you can make the ball spin and jump in ways you've never seen before. It's a mix of tennis and magic that makes playing tennis even more fun and exciting! Get ready to have a blast with Tennis Physics!
controls:
Player 1 hit - W
Player 2 hit - UP ARROW

name: Tetris
description: Rotate the shapes to fit them perfectly together. Don't let them reach the top.

name: The Impossible Quiz
description: It really is impossible. Don't even bother trying to beat it.
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: The Impossible Quiz 2
description: The second edition of the impossible quiz. Think you can beat it?

name: The Sims 2
description: Follow the story or just live your own life. In here you could do and be whatever you want.

name: There Is No Game
description: There Is No Game is a tricky, puzzle game (or not game). Disobey the instructions, because there is no game! This funny adventure isn't about rules. In fact, your entire job is to ignore the narrator! Break the title, play with the speaker icon, and unlock mini-games. Try to find the goat!

name: Time Shooter 2
description: A shooting game built in the same style as SuperHot, and features the same thrilling action that keeps you determined to beat each level.

name: Tube Jumpers
description: Stay afloat in the ultimate water-skiing competition! This adventure game lets you play against one, two, or three friends on the same device. In Tube Jumpers, you must bounce upwards to avoid waves, sharks, and other dangers in the water!

name: Tunnel Rush
description: Dodge the objects coming toward you in this endless tunnel. Beat your highscore!

name: UNO
description: Easy and fun card game. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards.
controls: Click and drag with the mouse

name: Vex 3
description: The third platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

name: Vex 4
description: The fourth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

name: Vex 5
description: The fifth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

name: Vex 6
description: The sixth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

name: Vex 7
description: The 7th platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

name: Volley Random
description: With fun ragdoll physics and a variety of variations, each match will be different. The playing court, ball and players may change. The important thing is to be able to get score under all conditions.

name: War Of Sticks
description: In the strategy game War of Sticks, you take control of the troops of a stick kingdom and manage their workload and resources to effectively destroy the opposing forces. Your poor stick people need to rebel against the tyrannical Red Empire. Up until the liberation of your people, mine, build, equip, upgrade, attack, and defend. Utilize your gold to buy units like shielders, archers, barbarians, and even wizards after first training miners to gather it. Build defense towers using the stones your miners gathered. To maximize your power, don't forget to improve all of your buildings and units.

name: Web Swinger
description: Swing from object to object with your webs. Try to get as far as you can and beat your highscore!

name: Wordle
description: You have limited attempts to find the word. Goodluck!

name: Worlds Hardest Game
description: Here it is. The worlds HARDEST game. Think you stand a chance?

name: Worlds Hardest Game 2
description: The second episode of the self-proclaimed world's hardest game series! Hone your reflexes and accuracy as you try to move your little block to the end of each stage without touching the obstacles.

name: YoHoHo.io
description: Ahoy, matey! Ye have been marooned on a tropical island with other pirates... Only one will survive and plunder the booty. Give no quarter!
controls:
To move, use your mouse or press WASD/arrow keys
To attack, press left mouse button or space bar. Hold to charge an attack

name: Zombs Royale
description: 100 player 2D real-time massive multiplayer Battle Royale game in your browser, inspired by PUBG/Fortnite.
controls:
[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] - move
[Click] - attack
[e] - interact
[Space] - deploy
